basics.name: Dragoș-Paul Marinescu
basics.label: Senior Frontend Engineer
basics.summary:
Experienced Senior Frontend Engineer with over 7 years experience building large scale apps with React / Typescript.

Worked on and scaled various early and mid-level tech start-ups as well as established banking clients using technologies like: Typescript, React, Electron, NodeJS, Redux.

Recently have led and mentored the development teams during my contracting roles, building cool projects like a fully fledged browser-based screen recorder as well as native apps for tracking, monitoring and servicing gas engines for one of the largest producers in the world.

references.name: Klaus Zöggeler, Leader Digital Development, INNIO GROUP

references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Dragos Marinescu both as a person and as a professional. I have known Dragos for over two years, during which time he worked as a full-stack software developer in my team. From day one, during the time that he has worked in our company, Dragos impressed us with his willingness to learn and his capacity to understand new concepts. Also, he has a work rate that I have rarely seen at other developers. He has quickly established himself as a reliable programmer, writing good quality code and supporting the team whenever needed. He is both very bright and quite motivated. I am confident that he will quickly become an indispensable asset of any software development team. Dragos often surprised everyone with out-of-the box ideas or solutions to different problems. I particularly appreciate his willingness to take initiative to help the team achieve it's goals and deliver on time.
references.name: Horia Andrei Văleanu, CTO, Questia Group.

work.summary:
Lead the development of an industry-leading web-based screen recorder from the ground up in a team of 5 developers.

Functionality includes recording multiple streams individually (screen, slides, camera, audio), manipulating the streams, multiple scenes recording and integrating them within Veed's web-based editor.

Arive is a start-up looking to deliver your favourite brands in under 30 minutes.

At Arive, I have joined as a Front-End Engineer and during the 4 month contract I helped them design, architect and bootstrap the content management platform using React. I collaborated with product and design teams in order to create an efficient, fast and scalable platform.

In addition to that, I have also mentored their existing team of front-end developers and took lead on implementing the features - this includes code reviews, sprint planning, story assignments, as well as general help when implementing/debugging code.

Innio is one of the top manufacturers of gas engines in the market. In order to digitalize their business, I helped them build an IoT application for the management of their engines and technicians across the world.

For the engines, some of the features include tracking engine performance, monitoring and updating functioning parameters, triggering and resolving alerts.

For the technicians, features I have built include multi-device sync, offline capabilities, conflict handling on form inputs, tracking time entries and expenses, report preview and generation.

Aera is building a cognitive platform capable of understanding, recommending, predicting, and autonomously executing decisions to improve your business' supply chain management solution.

As Front-end Lead, I have started one of the company's backbone projects within the Aera Platform and implemented the architecture for it. I have mentored the junior and mid level developers across Romania, US, and Pakistan. I have also set up the CI/CD pipeline and Sonarqube in order to increase code quality.

The web-app allowed users to create skills and integrate them within Aera's data types, while also creating advanced schematics and data warehouse solutions.

Deloitte Digital builds and delivers end-to-end projects for client's business.

As Front-end Engineer at Deloitte, I have helped define the architecture of a digital transformation project for Prudential, one of UK's largest financial institutions.

The digital suite of secure web applications was designed with React & Redux & Typescript, following a micro-frontends approach that allowed greater productivity and less conflicts when developing, as each feature team was responsible for one micro-frontend. The apps were then coupled using Lerna and shipped as a standalone app that allowed consultants to create and manage pension schemes, clients and applications.

In the Bucharest office, I have also acted as Front-End Lead across the four feature teams, by taking architectural decisions, code reviewing, and by mentoring junior and mid-level developers write clean, testable and scalable code.

Moreover, I was actively involved in Deloitte's recruitment process and have worked closely with project managers across the different projects in Deloitte in order to develop efficient interviewing practices and to hire passionate, talented, and knowledgeable developers.

Questia Group offers agile market research services offering real time results for a fraction of the cost of 'traditional' methods.

As a Full-Stack Developer at Questia, I have helped build the web / mobile platforms necessary for the business to function. This included the primary platform for users to interact with each other, to view their profiles, answer dynamic surveys, etc. In addition to this, I have also helped build the admin website that allows content managers to create dynamic surveys, manage users, send newsletters, create raffles, post articles, etc.

I have created a mobile-companion application with similar features as the primary platform so that users can more easily stay in touch with the surveys and articles posted within the app.

projects.name: Deep Learning Models
projects.summary: Having fun with understanding and building deep learning models.
highlights: Recurrent Neural Networks for generating data / sentiment prediction
Generative Adversarial Networks for generating pictures, such as human faces

projects.name: Crypto
projects.summary: Building a NodeJS Binance trading bot that detects volatility spikes and attempts to profit off of them.
